headline: 2023.09.17. - Project Kickoff: Drowning Detection in Lakes
texts: So Im starting a new project. This project is about to prevent people drowning in lakes.
The idea is to make a model that detects the people in the water. After the people are detected, we can track how many people are in each region of the picture.

headline: 2023.09.23. - How to render markdown files dynamically in react.ts
texts: I just made this feature to my personal web page, that I can post content the way that I need to only make a new object in my 'posts.json' and drag a markdown file into my posts folder.
I faced some problem and I didnt found a good article that covers all the information about this topic, so I came up with the idea to make my own.
If you are interested in how I implemented this, and how I solved the little frustrating problems, or/and you want to make a similar feature on  your site, enjoy this article.
